SEARCH
Package units

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
units.Unit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Coloured, Drawable
public abstract class Unit extends Object implements Drawable, Coloured
Unit : an abstract class to define basics of towers and living entities. The default attack mode is intended to be defined by the player directly in order not to bother setting it manually each time they invoke an ally. The attacker property is a flag to identify a unit as ally or enemy.

    • Unit

      public Unit(String name, boolean attacker, Element element, long maxHealth, long attack, float range, long attackDelay, Point2D.Float spawnPosition, long health)
      Constructor for Unit, unsafe as there is no stats validation, be careful with this
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the unit
      attacker - the side of the unit
      element - the unit's element
      maxHealth - the unit's max health points
      attack - the unit's attack points
      range - the unit's range
      attackDelay - the unit's attack delay in milliseconds
      spawnPosition - the unit's initial position
      health - the unit's initial health points

      public long hurt(long damage, Element damageElement)
      Offsets the unit's health, negatively(hurt) or positively (heal)
      Parameters:
      damage - the gamage to inflict, negative for healing
      damageElement - the damage element to get the right multiplier, ignored for healing
      Returns:
      the damage actually taken by the Unit (negative if healed)
